document_data.name: Detect Illusion
document_data.mainbody: '''''Detect illusion''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[illusionist]]s to detect illusions.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster was able to both see an illusion and know it was an illusion. Individuals around the illusion would see it if the caster made physical contact with the illusion while the spell was in effect.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a piece of either crystal, glass or [[mica]]. Whichever component was chosen, it had to be tinted with a yellow [[dye]].
